segment.source: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption
segment.target: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption

segment.source: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption
segment.target: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption

segment.source: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption
segment.target: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption

segment.source: Compare the overall system power to the power that the system consumes when you use a clean installation.
segment.target: Compare the overall system power to the power that the system consumes when you use a clean installation.

segment.source: With preinstalled applications and power policies, some computers have shown a 40 percent decrease in battery performance compared with a clean Windows® installation.
segment.target: With preinstalled applications and power policies, some computers have shown a 40 percent decrease in battery performance compared with a clean Windows® installation.

segment.source: However, through careful engineering, computers can achieve equal or improved performance over a clean Windows installation.
segment.target: However, through careful engineering, computers can achieve equal or improved performance over a clean Windows installation.

segment.source: Determining the causes of heavy battery use
segment.target: Determining the causes of heavy battery use

segment.source: You can determine the causes of heavy battery use by looking at the way that the system uses resources.
segment.target: You can determine the causes of heavy battery use by looking at the way that the system uses resources.

segment.source: You can find many system problems by looking at processor idle time.
segment.target: You can find many system problems by looking at processor idle time.

segment.source: Use a performance tool, such as Windows Assessments or the Windows Performance Toolkit, to investigate when the system has spikes in power use.
segment.target: Use a performance tool, such as Windows Assessments or the Windows Performance Toolkit, to investigate when the system has spikes in power use.

segment.source: Performance tools can help you target the applications that are causing increased processor use.
segment.target: Performance tools can help you target the applications that are causing increased processor use.

segment.source: For more information, see Windows Assessment Toolkit and Windows Performance Toolkit.
segment.target: For more information, see Windows Assessment Toolkit and Windows Performance Toolkit.
